lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SEP has been carrying out a series of nearly 50 simulated-altitude tests on the redesigned starter at its tightly guarded plant in the town of Vernon, 80 km northwest of Paris.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Arianespace-SEP statement said that during a test on March 23, a fault in the preparation of the altitude simulation chamber meant a component of the motor came under abnormal pressure.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A joint statement from the European Arianespace consortium and the motor manufacturer Societe Europeenne de Propulsion (SEP) said that to avoid any risk, the motor had been dismantled and could not be used in the next launch.
